ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] The Nameless server
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya! Not sure if Gaydari mentioned it be there is a queer guild on rodcet Nife called the Mystic Alliance.  You are welcome to join us there if you want ...
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya!

Not sure if Gaydari mentioned it be there is a queer guild on rodcet Nife
called the Mystic Alliance. You are welcome to join us there if you want
:) We've had a lot of poeple coming over to us from other serves lately,
even leaving their high lvl charhcters. But they all tell me it has been
well-worth the move. Adiitionally since the guild is set up, it can be
exported to any server. We ahve done this previously on other serves,
Brell for instance, but i guess the guild has dwindled on those servers.

If your not dead-set on ahving your guilds name we can easily export the
Mystic Allaince to the nameless even if its just you (i.e. you dont need
10 people) thast how the Mystic Alliance got to me about a year ago, and
now we have a ton of poelpe most of whom play regularly :)

-joe
Fentus Fayspark
Guildleader - Mystic Alliance
Rodcet Nife

On Wed, 2 Aug 2000, Terry Walker
wrote:

> Howdy. Glad to find this group. I was pointed here by Gaydari/Anoka.
>
> I'm the one who's trying to create a queer guild on The Nameless
> Server. I've already picked out "Nameless Love" as its name.
> Catchy, eh?
>
> I'm hoping that I can snag a few people from here willing to help us
> set up shop on the server. I need at least 10 concurrent people to
> sign on long enough to create the guild. Anyone willing to donate at
> least that much time to the cause? :)
>
> Anyway, you can read the charter I typed up for it at
> http://antinomy.org/nameless.html . Be forewarned, this site works
> only when my pc is not booted into Win2000 to play games (including
> EQ). When I'm not goofing around, I have it booted to BeOS with the
> webserver running. So if the address doesn't connect, just try again
> later.
>
> *wave*
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
